videos.description: Nikola Vucevic rattles the rim first, then Zach LaVine completes the alley-oop off a feed from Tomas Satoransky.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Vucevic, LaVine put down dunks in short order) 2021/05/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Vucevic, LaVine put down dunks in short order
